title: Lamb cannelloni with mint pesto
ingredients: ['250g lasagne sheets', '2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '200g minced lamb', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '1 teaspoon thyme', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '160g goat cheese, crumbled', '1 bunch fresh mint', '4 tablespoons pine nuts', '6 tablespoons olive oil']
